title: Map of Locations of Interest
content:
[[iftags +fragment]]

**Note**: the map below (and nothing else on this page) can be included on any page that doesn't have the fragment tag, using the following code:
[[div class="code"]]
@<[[include :scp-wiki:fragment:locations-map>@
]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
[[collapsible show="▷ Instructions for Additions" hide="◁ Adding a Nexus, Free Port, or Other Location of Interest"]]
Copy and edit the following code, replacing x_coordinate and y_coordinate with numbers (representing distance from the top left corner in percent) and replacing url_for_the_image with the image link for the Site or Area icon.

For a Nexus, use {{textclass=numbermap}} to overlay the Nexus or Freeport number using {{text=##}}:
[[div class="code"]]
@<[[include :scp-wiki:component:mapping-source>@
facility=-- |
x=x_coordinate |
y=y_coordinate |
image=url_for_the_image|
textclass=numbermap |
text=##|
font-size=0.4 |
]]
[[/div]]

The URLs for the 7 Area Class images, defined in the key below the map:
https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Briar.svg
https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Asphodel.svg
https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Camelot.svg
https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Dunwich.svg
https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Shangri-La.svg
https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Crossroads.svg
https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Turing.svg

For a Free Port, use {{textclass=numbermap}} to overlay the Free Port number using {{text=##}}:
[[div class="code"]]
@<[[include :scp-wiki:component:mapping-source>@
facility=-- |
x=x_coordinate |
y=y_coordinate |
image=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Free-Port.svg|
textclass=numbermap |
text=##|
font-size=0.5 |
]]
[[/div]]

While it would be nice to have subtitles for every Nexus and Free Port, this would put too much text on the map, so it's reserved for Locations without numbers.

For a Location of Interest, use {{textclass=subtitlemap}} to place the name below the icon using {{text=Name}}:
[[div class="code"]]
@<[[include :scp-wiki:component:mapping-source>@
facility=-- |
x=x_coordinate |
y=y_coordinate |
image=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Location-of-Interest.svg|
textclass=subtitlemap |
text=Name|
]]
[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]
@@@@

[[module CSS]]
.legend-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(min(90px, 100%), 1fr));
    grid-gap: 10px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

.legend-box {
    width:90px; 
    border: 1px solid white; 
}
[[/module]]
